title: Still no Red response on recent issues?
body:
This thread isn't going to be about whether "x or y content" should be allowed to be posted here (The content in question really has no place here anyway, but that's another argument). It's about the **lack of professionalism and consistency**.

Many frequent users who post here have been permanently banned, for very vague reasons "Don't be a jerk". Should their posts have been removed? Yeah, probably, but to go straight to a PERMANENT ban? It's obviously excessive\\ This is all being handled unprofessionally in a "Just ban them and hope the problem goes away" mentality.

I mean it's up to Riot what they don't want posted here (And I'm in agreement that content had NO place here) but it needs to be handled in a better way, instead of just banning people who NEVER posted said content.
